snippet: The New York police say James David Martin, accused in Marleny Cruz’s death on the basis of a DNA match, strangled at least three people.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; New York City Police arrest James David Martin in the 1998 death of Marleny Cruz on the basis of DNA evidence; Martin is believed to be involved in the strangling death of at least three people.
lead_paragraph: The New York police say James David Martin, accused in Marleny Cruz’s death on the basis of a DNA match, strangled at least three people.

headline.seo: Girl Killed in ’98 Is Thought to Be Victim of Serial Killer - Crime Scene
headline.main: 14 Years in an Unmarked Grave, and Finally a Break in the Case
headline.print_headline: 14 Years in an Unmarked Grave, and Finally a Break in the Case
